org.springframework.web.reactive.config

类 WebReactiveConfigurerComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.reactive.config.WebReactiveConfigurerComposite
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    WebReactiveConfigurer

    public class WebReactiveConfigurerComposite
extends Object
implements WebReactiveConfigurer
    A WebReactiveConfigurer that delegates to one or more others.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Brian Clozel, Rossen Stoyanchev

    • 方法详细资料

      • addWebReactiveConfigurers

        public void addWebReactiveConfigurers(List<WebReactiveConfigurer> configurers)

      • configureContentTypeResolver

        public void configureContentTypeResolver(RequestedContentTypeResolverBuilder builder)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Configure how the content type requested for the response is resolved.

        The given builder will create a composite of multiple RequestedContentTypeResolvers, each defining a way to resolve the the requested content type (accept HTTP header, path extension, parameter, etc).

        指定者:
        configureContentTypeResolver 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer
        参数:
        builder - factory that creates a CompositeContentTypeResolver

      • addCorsMappings

        public void addCorsMappings(CorsRegistry registry)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Configure cross origin requests processing.
        指定者:
        addCorsMappings 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer
        另请参阅:

      • configurePathMatching

        public void configurePathMatching(PathMatchConfigurer configurer)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Configure path matching options.

        The given configurer assists with configuring HandlerMappings with path matching options.

        指定者:
        configurePathMatching 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer
        参数:
        configurer - the PathMatchConfigurer instance

      • addArgumentResolvers

        public void addArgumentResolvers(List<HandlerMethodArgumentResolver> resolvers)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Provide custom controller method argument resolvers. Such resolvers do not override and will be invoked after the built-in ones.
        指定者:
        addArgumentResolvers 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer
        参数:
        resolvers - a list of resolvers to add

      • configureMessageReaders

        public void configureMessageReaders(List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageReader<?>> readers)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Configure the message readers to use for decoding the request body where @RequestBody and HttpEntity controller method arguments are used. If none are specified, default ones are added based on WebReactiveConfigurationSupport.addDefaultHttpMessageReaders(java.util.List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageReader<?>>).

        See WebReactiveConfigurer.extendMessageReaders(List) for adding readers in addition to the default ones.

        指定者:
        configureMessageReaders 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer
        参数:
        readers - an empty list to add message readers to

      • extendMessageReaders

        public void extendMessageReaders(List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageReader<?>> readers)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        An alternative to WebReactiveConfigurer.configureMessageReaders(List) that allows modifying the message readers to use after default ones have been added.
        指定者:
        extendMessageReaders 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer

      • addFormatters

        public void addFormatters(org.springframework.format.FormatterRegistry registry)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Add custom Converters and Formatters for performing type conversion and formatting of controller method arguments.
        指定者:
        addFormatters 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer

      • getValidator

        public Optional<org.springframework.validation.Validator> getValidator()
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Provide a custom Validator.

        By default a validator for standard bean validation is created if bean validation api is present on the classpath.

        指定者:
        getValidator 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer

      • getMessageCodesResolver

        public Optional<org.springframework.validation.MessageCodesResolver> getMessageCodesResolver()
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Provide a custom MessageCodesResolver to use for data binding instead of the one created by default in DataBinder.
        指定者:
        getMessageCodesResolver 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer

      • configureMessageWriters

        public void configureMessageWriters(List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageWriter<?>> writers)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Configure the message writers to use to encode the response body based on the return values of @ResponseBody, and ResponseEntity controller methods. If none are specified, default ones are added based on WebReactiveConfigurationSupport.addDefaultHttpMessageWriters(List).

        See WebReactiveConfigurer.extendMessageWriters(List) for adding writers in addition to the default ones.

        指定者:
        configureMessageWriters 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer
        参数:
        writers - a empty list to add message writers to

      • extendMessageWriters

        public void extendMessageWriters(List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageWriter<?>> writers)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        An alternative to WebReactiveConfigurer.configureMessageWriters(List) that allows modifying the message writers to use after default ones have been added.
        指定者:
        extendMessageWriters 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer

      • configureViewResolvers

        public void configureViewResolvers(ViewResolverRegistry registry)
        从接口复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurer
        Configure view resolution for processing the return values of controller methods that rely on resolving a View to render the response with. By default all controller methods rely on view resolution unless annotated with @ResponseBody or explicitly return ResponseEntity. A view may be specified explicitly with a String return value or implicitly, e.g. void return value.
        指定者:
        configureViewResolvers 在接口中 WebReactiveConfigurer
        另请参阅:
        ViewResolverRegistry
